content: christmas pudding hat pattern with holly sprig get the toddler size free on the dora does blog this is suitable for beginners with some experience as well as the written pattern there is a youtube tutorial available to guide you through making the holly sprig in left handed https //youtu be/nqlp\_g0x4ti https //youtu be/nqlp\_g0x4ti right handed https //youtu be/nli45ie0pgg https //youtu be/nli45ie0pgg materials 4mm hook yarn double knit yarn in white and brown for the hat and green and red for the holly and berry sprig the amount of yarn is dependent on which size hat you make but should not be more than 150yds of brown and white for the largest hat in the item pictured i used stylecraft special dk in white walnut green for the leaves and lipstick for the berries sizes dimensions for the beanies are given in the pattern the pattern is written out separately for each of the following sizes newborn - 3 months 3 - 6 months 6 - 12 months 12 - 24 months toddler child teen / small adult large adult copyright dora does the pattern is for personal use only and may not be shared or redistributed without written consent
